news.content:
What you'll find in this exciting release (live on testnet): Updates to the eVDC, 3Bot SDK, Quantum Safe Filesystem, Zero-OS, and Digital Twin!

You can find the full release notes here.

Join our testing community, now up to more than 160 members!
news.excerpt: Updates to the eVDC, 3Bot SDK, Quantum Safe Filesystem, Zero-OS, and Digital Twin!

previous.title: Grid 2.7 is Live on Testnet
previous.excerpt: Last week we announced Grid 2.6 live on testnet, and a week later here we are announcing Grid 2.7!

next.title: Grid 2.4 is coming to mainnet soon!
